name: Shoot'n Sail
description:
Shoot'n Sail

Sail through this pirate war!

When peace is not an option on the seven seas, we must hoist our sails and ready our guns. Are you ready, sailor?

Be more agile than your enemies and don't let them hit you. The more slaughters you do, the higher your reputation among pirates will be.

Bypass the islands and avoid the rocks. These lands may be unknown, but a map can help you. Sometimes the sea can be more treacherous than our enemies.

How to play

Up Arrow: Accelerate towards the winds

Right and Left Arrow: Rotate to a better angle

W, A and D: Fire the cannons!

Credits

Shoot'n Sail is a game made by Gustavo Giardi.

Sprite Assets by Kenney.

Musics:

Mere Baubles by Spring.

Blackmoor Tides by Matthew Pablo.

Haul Away Joe by CambridgeBayWeather.
